id.description:
An optional ID that you can assign to this group in order to refer to it from somewhere else.

This ID should be unique within all groups in the same compartment.

An optional ID that you can assign to this mapping in order to refer to it from somewhere else.

This ID should be unique within all mappings in the compartment.

An optional ID that you can assign to this parameter in order to refer to it from somewhere else.

This ID should be unique within all parameters in the same compartment.
